## Feature Request

### Feature Description

Clearly describe the new feature you are requesting.

### Problem to Solve

Explain what problem or need this feature addresses.

### Proposed Solution

If you have an idea of how it could be implemented, describe it here.

### Additional Context (optional)

Add any other context, references, or examples to support the request.
